title: Correspondence of James Fenimore-Cooper /
author: Cooper, James Fenimore
snippet: I see by the papers that the misfortunes of poor Eckford  have been far heavier than any that can proceed from the malice and envy of his fellow creatures.

title: Murmurings from rugged waters.
author: Broomfield, James Polwarth. [from old catalog]
snippet: But, alas ! it graced a deformed body and limbs, a body that was but a target for the sneers of the unfeeling,  — ^turned homewards, brushing past his mother, whO' watched from the turnyett her two braw lads following the brawny Eckford.
